channel.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
channel.description: [b][i][/i][/b] Hello, as a new server-owner i would like to know how to change the ip of your server rather than the default ip 0.0.0.0. FOR EXAMPLE: ok i have a source PIMPSCAPE,i open up my extracted folder click run.bat i have my no-ip thingy running too, and it says PIMPSCAPE is now running on 0.0.0.0 43594! and i would like it to say: PIMPSCAPE is now running on v1nscape.no-ip.org 43594! could u help me please :(?

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“o0 v 1 n o0, post:1, topic:152177”]
Hello, as a new server-owner i would like to know how to change the ip of your server rather than the default ip 0.0.0.0.
FOR EXAMPLE: ok i have a source PIMPSCAPE,i open up my extracted folder click run.bat i have my no-ip thingy running too, and it says PIMPSCAPE is now running on 0.0.0.0 43594! and i would like it to say: PIMPSCAPE is now running on v1nscape.no-ip.org 43594! could u help me please :(?[/quote]

No one likes you v1n, pfft you hacked my forums page

GET A LIFE PUNK!

Read full topic
item.source: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

try logging in with 127.0.0.1
oh and fyi you canot log in with your own ip you make. you need to log in with 127.0.0.1 and make sure no-ip is open

Read full topic

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

Just find your router on there, if you dont know what it is ask your parents or look at it. Then follow the instructions.

item.source: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

It does that because you didn’t port forward correctly and you don’t need to port forward to connect to your localadress.

www.portforward.com to fix it

Read full topic
item.source: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

yes but when i try to log onto my server with v1nscape.no-ip.org (which is what i got set on my no-ip thingy with it checked and a smiley face on it) it doesnt let me log on but when i go to 0.0.0.0 as ip and port 5555 it works wtf?

Read full topic
item.source: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Yeah, it really doesn’t matter what your runserver is saying, as long as you’ve port forwarded and got a no-ip.

item.title: Setting ip to what u want rather than 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

It’s supposed to say that. That means it’s running from home (your PC). Once you get it all set up, it will work still.

Sorry for previous double-post.
